# questionMetadataPreperation

The goal of questionMetadataPreperation is to help with preparing 
question-metadata for the metadatamanagement system of the research data center 
of the dzhw. https://metadata.fdz.dzhw.eu

## Installation

You can install the released version of questionMetadataPreperation from [Github](https://github.com/dzhw/questionMetadataPreperation) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("dzhw/questionMetadataPreperation")
```
